attributes.action: Provide funding for the creation of flood defences in the historic market town of Pickering, North Yorkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £700,000 has been spent on the design for flood defences that would save the town from the devastation of flooding, but no funding has yet been provided to create the defences. This petition calls on the Government to fund the defences.
